summary:
Revenue-driven professional with over 2 years of experience in the Ad Tech industry. I aim to help my publishers reach their objectives by adopting a consultative approach and provide strategic inputs/ideas.

I am an experienced Sales Executive, with strong communication and negotiating skills.  I've performed the entire sales cycle from initial outreach, all the way to negotiation and closure.

Strengths include key account management, business development, business analysis, time-sensitive project management and strategic planning.

profile_positions.description:
iion is a leading advertising and monetization platform, purpose-built to reach every audience segment across all gaming environments.

With headquarters in Sydney, Australia and offices in the Netherlands, India, and Poland, iion works with over 200+ publishers across geographies in multiple time zones.

iion was founded with a vision to empower publishers to focus on what they do best: create awesome content and engage users. Our mission is to support online content creation for billions of readers across the globe.

Role :

■ Pre-sales, New Business Development, Account Management, Client Servicing
■ Manage all areas of the business development - Market scanning, identifying and prospecting
■ Website & App Publishers, Aggregators & Display Networks, communicating AdSparc's value
proposition, negotiating and renewing contracts.
■ Building cordial relationships, monetize inventory and get incremental revenue from accounts
through regular account monitoring and management
■ Developing & executing strategies from scratch tuned towards growth & acquisition of clients
who are interested in monetizing online inventory
■ Ideate new ways to increase the traffic on board
■ Responsible for developing sales collateral's
■ Streamline processes for Account Optimization and Payments
■ Mentor, manage, direct and develop a Business Development team
■ Work on various platforms like AppNexus, Google AdX, Rubicon, Sovrn, MediaMath, MobFox,
OpenX, AOL, BidSwitch, Smaato etc.
profile_positions.title: Publisher Success Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities:

-Work with the management team to identify and assess new market & new target clients.
-Work with the management team to develop and implement a strategic sales plan.
-Assisted in designing and handling their social media pages
-Handled the back-end page of their website
profile_positions.title: Sales Executive
